reviewText: It was exactly what I wanted and what I expected.
My son loves it!  No other cartoons have gotten his attention like the hive!
LOVE THESE DVD'S ESPECIALLY SINCE DISNEY ISNT AIRING THEM ANYMORE
I bought it for my niece and she loves it. I also bought her the talking Buzzbee doll. The video was great.
Great animated cartoon for small kids. My little one instantly fell in love with all the little bees:) It's very entertaining and very nicely animated.
This DVD was also a present for my nephews daughter. I really hope she liked it.
My son Loves this show. I wish it was still on air and we could find more toys he loves. DVD was sent safely in Buble wrap and was if good quality.
Lol but seriously, we were so bummed Netflix took this show off a d were happy Dvds were available.

No other show got my two girls attention like the hive & they took it off Netflix & on demand!! My 3 year old still loves it as much as she did when she was 1 & asks everyday to watch  buzz bee 
 so Glad I found these!
Great condition. The hive is a great show for kids very wholesome and teaches good lessons.
Grand daughter loves this show and now it is portable.  Great price
Very cute movies for preschool kids.

This is my son's all-time favorite show ever. These bees are adorable. I just wish there was more shows to watch and more toys to buy! Thankfully this DVD has multiple episodes to keep us busy. Worth every cent and more!!!
Our gals love this show because their daddy is a bee keeper.
